website_summaries.verdict: An affordable bag that fits tripods up to 23 inches.
pros: Nylon bag is constructed to last
Includes a zippered opening that enables you to quickly open and close the bag
Comes with an adjustable shoulder strap
Offers a zippered pocket on the side that you can use to store various camera accessories
cons: Bag does not have any padding and may be too small for some tripods

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed economical tripod/monopod case for travel!
customer_reviews.text: A very pleasant surprise! This case was so much nicer than I expected for the price. My monpod fits nicely with plenty of room to spare for extra camera gear. I like the I.D. window and the separate small zippered pocket to stash memory cards or monopod foot for quick change. The strap is large enough for crossbody wear or reduces to comfortable size for over the shoulder. The case will be a great travel companion.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: I did not need a tripod bag. I needed a bag for a portable ham radio antenna. This bag allows me to get a 30 inch collapsible whip and the Wolf River Coil, along with the tripod and counterpoise wires into the bag and still have room for connectors and coaxial cable. I recommend this bag for that purpose and do so enthusiastically.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Great Tripod Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I have been keeping my camera tripod in its original box and hauling it around when needed it. Since I didn't use it away from home a lot, it didn't bother me. I've got into taking videos and pics in different places recently and searched for a cheap solution to carry it with me and this was a GREAT find! Seems very durable (but haven't had a lot of use to know for sure yet), has I.D. place and its roomy enough to carry other things. I can finally throw away the box LOL
customer_reviews.author: macbabe

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT get this for the 330DX/340DX
customer_reviews.text: PROS: + The price was OK. CONS: - It does not fit my Slik 330DX well, despite it being advertised as compatible with the 330DX. I think the bag is way too large for the 330DX, so the tripod kept sliding somewhat in the bag-awkward. - The bag is not padded, so it only provides little protection for the tripod. Conclusion: If you're getting this for 330/340DX, don't! Look further.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the $
customer_reviews.text: You get bang for your $ on this one. My tripod hight top to bottom is 23 inches and it fit great with some room to spare. The straps could be more spread out but for the price I can still be happy with it. Has a very small zipper pocket could use it for a small batteries or memory chips. Also has a slot for a name ID tag(like the kind you see on luggage cases).
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: Good roomy bag. Has a place for identification or whatever also a little zipper pocket for some small accessories like tripod spikes if you're tripod has them. in main compartment Can fit a microphone stand not fully assembled along with a small to medium-sized tripod with room for tripod head. Depending on the size of your tripod .
customer_reviews.author: J. E.

customer_reviews.title: Great little sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: Great little case with side pocket. I’m using it for my iPad tripod stand that I use when playing music. We’ve been carrying the stand around for a few years and the case it came in continually had problems with tears. This is much sturdier and has a side pocket for picks, etc. As soon as my husband saw mine, he purchased one too.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Durable Tripod Case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for use with the tripod that came with my Vixen Valerie Star Tracker. The tripod when folded up measures 20" in length which the case easily accommodates and probably could be used with a folded tripod measuring up to 23". The case is not padded, which is not an issue for a trip, but is made of very good, durable material which should last for a long time. It even has a see through pocket for identification. It's a good case and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag for the Jamstick+
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a Jamstik+ guitar trainer. The travel bag for the Jamstik was $49.99 and did not have good reviews saying it was too tight and too short to fit everything into the bag for the Jamstik. This tripod bag size medium is perfect for the Jamstik and only $7.49. I saved a bundle of money. I will line the inside of the travel bag with foam so that my Jamstik doesn’t move around. It’s absolutely perfect for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hart

customer_reviews.title: An adequately sturdy design with good craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Not a top of the line by any means, but for the price a VERY good bag. Purchased it to keep my phone tripod in (bag that came with the tripod was basic and flimsy at best. Has a spot for a name card. Zipper seems solid. The stitching looks good. She should do the job I have planned for her.
customer_reviews.author: A.H. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to put it to a severe test but it is sturdily constructed and is a fit for my Slik tripod (no surprise there). It would serve well with most any tripod of about 30" collapsed. Keep in mind that it is not padded, but a tripod is not a lens and just how much banging around do you plan to do it?
customer_reviews.author: BrockTungsten

customer_reviews.title: Read the Details first
customer_reviews.text: I failed to read all the details on this bag. It is good for transporting a tripod, but is not padded and that is what I was wanting. I kept the bag for storage, but do not recommend for transporting or protecting a tripod. It is on me for not reading all the details about the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive option
customer_reviews.text: This is a good multipurpose bag. The quality isn’t incredible, but at this price point, it’s silly to expect that. This will serve you well to lug your tripod around from job to car. I wouldn’t trust it alone as a piece of checked luggage, but I’ve used it to store my tripod in a checked bag with no issues. There’s a nice little sleeve to put a business card for ID in it which is nice. Zippers feel a bit cheap, but have kept on ticking so far. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tennsplyr9

customer_reviews.title: Quality, affordable product
customer_reviews.text: When you pay $7.99 for a product, you keep your fingers crossed that it's decent quality. My tripod bag arrived yesterday, so I have not put in a long-term test. All I can say is my tripod fits, the bag seems sturdy and well-built and the price was definitely right!
customer_reviews.author: SBSDC

customer_reviews.title: product works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Bought to go with a tripod I already owned, as a birthday present for my 12-year-old grandson who is a budding videographer. Might have been nice to have at least SOME kind of padding, since there's so much extra room inside to also use for other items.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my tripod....outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: This large tripod bag fits my unit perfectly, with zippers conveniently located for easy insertion and removal of my tripod, plus a fairly comfortable carrying strap. I'd definitely buy this again if I needed to. Also, the seller - Focus Camera, was extremely cooperative and pleasant when I initially ordered the wrong size bag (totally my fault). Even though it was long after the return period, they accepted the return after I supplied pictures that it was still in brand-new condition. They were extremely rapid in responding to emails and issuing a refund. A++ retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Works on My Cameras with Slight Bulkiness
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple cameras I utilize for my blogs and social media posts and needed a universal tripod that could work on multiple cameras. i came across this beauty and was amazed with how it was able to work so easily with them all. With that being said, it is a little bulky. The bag does do wonder to keep the tripod safe from any debris.
customer_reviews.author: AlexPCPA

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good
customer_reviews.text: I don't ask a lot from a tripod bag. Cover the tripod from view, shield it from the environment, don't overcomplicate things. This bag delivers 100%, does everything I want it to and no more with no excessive weight or bulk. A strip of gaffer's tape over the logo and it looks like a little folding chair bag.
customer_reviews.author: L. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Holds the Bosch Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to hold the Bosch tripod and 360 camera for taking pics on jobsites, Works perfectly and seems to be holding up after quite a bit of use. Wipes down well after being dropped into sloppy mud with nothing getting inside.
customer_reviews.author: James Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Love the case!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my new BOG Deathgrip Carbon Fiber Tripod like it was made for it! Excellent case and just what I needed. Ordered 2 more for my buddies for their Deathgrips. Thanks for an excellent product at a reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.author: The Safety Guy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Tripod Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Even better, to be honest. 23" tripod fits perfectly with room to spare for other camera gear. It's not padded but that doesn't matter to me. It's the perfect bag for storing and carrying your tripod. Toss in some extra stuff, if you like. You'll be pleased, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Don W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at what I got for $7. I took my gitzo weekender on an international trip in this bag. I had to flip my center coloumn upside down to fit it but so what. Its not super high quality but for the price and the fact that I have had 0 problems with it i am 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: K6

customer_reviews.title: It makes traveling with tripods much easier and more convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have two small tripods with legs that extend. I don't have exact measurements but both fit in the bag perfectly with just enough room to put my gopro camera case inside. The shoulder strap makes it easy to carry around for traveling. Quality and durability is ok but not the best. I would recommend it as it does make it easier to carry tripods around, especially when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected something a little more flimsy. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this bag. I liked it so well, I just ordered another one for my other tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Karen MTM

customer_reviews.title: Finally got a Nice Travel Bag for the Lightweight Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be of good quality with a nice zipper. A little larger than I needed but I can put some extras in there with it. If you bought a tripod that didn't come with a case, this is the one to get. Nice price too.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Chief 17

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!  Nice Tripod Case!
customer_reviews.text: Durable tripod case. Great value for the money. Have used it for a few months now and it still looks and works just fine. The zippers are still working well and the seams are sturdy. I’m happy with my purchase. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never used it
customer_reviews.text: The design and quality are perfect. I was going to use it for my previous tripod because I bought another tripod camera mount. I wasn't able to remove the original tripod camera mount.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Might not need this case
customer_reviews.text: This tripod case is a suggested add-on when purchasing the Slik Sprint Pro II tripod on amazon. The tripod description doesn't mention it, but the tripod comes with a lightweight Slik tripod case already. Only add this on if you want a slightly heavier case, or for some reason you want two tripod cases. Nothing wrong with this case, it's just superfluous (and the cost of returning it nearly equals the refund, so....).
customer_reviews.author: Scott J.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a layer of cushion between my tripod and the rest of the equipment, to prevent everything from bumping and scratching into each other. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the value!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fits my Slik 340DX perfectly. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was the fact that the zipper is on the bottom of the bag instead of the top. I have not had any issues in limited use, but if I didn't zipper it completely the tripod may come open on a long hike.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great tripod bag for my purposes. I have a 20+ year Slik tripod and the old bag finally fell apart. I had room to spare in this bag. I measured my tripod prior to ordering. When I travel, I pack this in the middle of clothes in my checked luggage. I just came back from a trip and bag works to protect the tripod.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: So I was pleased to find that the material is in fact a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tripod shoulder bag that could fold flat in a suitcase (because I know airport security would insist on unpacking the tripod). I was thus a bit leery of the material being "vinyl" as that might not fold well or, if folded, might eventually crack. So I was pleased to find that the material is in fact a canvas like cloth rubberized on the inside. And in fact it was shipped folded. Fits a Manfrotto 293A4 well. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: K&J

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Husband has multiple tripods and often doesn't take them with him because they are too hard to carry. This bag solves the problem. He can store multiple tripods and carry over his shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just wished if the zipper was on the same side where the handles are because you will zip it (lock it) and will have to flip it to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Ousama Alkahwaji

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with its build quality. The tripod bag is well padded and heavy-duty in construction. Granted it was not a cheap bag but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: ALFRED CAPPELLO

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for my application
customer_reviews.text: I use to to carry my native american flutes.. They each are in separate cases then put it this carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: xman57

customer_reviews.title: Super tripod bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice zipper and long enough to easily store my tripod. Easy to carry and lightweight! Just what I wanted .
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bag from SLIK. I use them to store portable HAM radio antennas for use in the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: P. Btica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing you Tripod
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to store my Bosch tripod which I use for my Bosch laser level, worked out perfectly for me
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE MELISTAS

customer_reviews.title: Well made with sturdy fabric
customer_reviews.text: My 24" tripod fits perfectly in this SLIK bag. I haven't been able to use it yet, but it certainly looks like it will hold up for a long time. I look forward to it holding up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: kabella

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than two tripods
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say it’s that great but it is good. Had enough room to not just one or two tripods but three (maybe more, depends on the tripod. Thought my tripod wouldn’t fit into the bag but I was wrong, it definitely fits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! And considering the price you really can't beat ...
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! And considering the price you really can't beat it. I was a little concerned when I made this purchase because my tripod is actually about 27" but it fits in this bag perfectly. Extremely pleased with this purchase and highly recommend. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MDR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to carry my tripod, now I am hands free to wherever I decide to snap shots.
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, no padding
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and worth the $8-10 I paid. No padding, but a good solid bag.
customer_reviews.author: Compdude

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this bag to store my bbq utensils,very sturdy thick material, perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lori Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Cellphone Camera Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for use with your cell-phone camera to keep those shots steady.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tripod bag. Good quality materials, great value for the money. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, purposeful and useful
customer_reviews.text: Fits my stage music stand and folding boom microphone stand with a little room to spare. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Really rugged case - very thick and strong
customer_reviews.text: The Slik tripod that I purchased actually came with a case for it, I didn't realize that. But; this one is of better quality than the original one. It's much thicker , stronger than the other. I'm happy that I purchased it. I'm using the other case for one of my older tripods now.
customer_reviews.author: James  DaRoot

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived a day late but did not disappoint. The quality finish appears to be sound since I only recently received it. Time will tell. I have lightly used my mine already and it impressed for such a low price. The strap is comfortably placed and it fits my tripod, monopod and mini tripod all-in-one. So needed this item. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: K1 S

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite purchases. I use to use my camcorder to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases. I use to use my camcorder to short video. I have packed my cam away and now I use my IPhone with an adapter this case allows my to transport all my video accessories and tripod. Looks good and is very sturdy.0
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful and Trueful

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small tripods.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my travel tripod perfectly and even has zippered pocket for small accessories and tools.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go along with the Slik Pro 340DX that I ordered at the same time. Great little case! Kind of a chemical smell to it at first but that went away after the first time outside so don't hold that against it! I like that the Slik tripod leaves a bit of room at the top of the case so that I can drop a bottle of water in with it. Nice added bonus. I would recommend this case for any tripod under a folded length of 24".
customer_reviews.author: The Traveling Cats Tour

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Tripod Case
customer_reviews.text: The tripod case is lightweight and fit my 23" tripod perfectly. It is a great price and will be perfect for travel on our Hawaiian cruise in a few weeks. Product is just as described.
customer_reviews.author: JJS

customer_reviews.title: This is a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case for the price! I use it to store a Slik U9000 tripod in the car and it keeps it protected. It's not padded, so it won't help you if you bang it around a lot but my concern is to keep the tripod handy and clean and easily transportable - and this bag is ideal. The shoulder strap makes it very easy when I have to tote the tripod into the woods for wildlife photography. This is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: EusebiusTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect and with this quality, you cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Tripod case
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my new tripod. Material is not a thick as I would like but i consider it great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lalea M. M. King

customer_reviews.title: fit tripod perfectly
customer_reviews.text: it fit my tripod great, plus had the shoulder strap for easy transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Shagbark Hickory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My tripod fits in there well and even holds my mono pod
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For simple I padded case for my monopod this worked very well. Won’t last forever but for the cost it’s a bargain
customer_reviews.author: Mike Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is a good bag, that serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag, that serves the purpose. It's not padded. I use it for Koolehaoda Professional Camera Aluminium Monopod & Ballhead with Folding Three Feet. The original bag was too small for it.
customer_reviews.author: TedyG

customer_reviews.title: A great case, well made and perfect for a 22" monopod pr tripod!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Slik 24" Tripod Case. It fits my Benro Monopod perfectly and thus will go into my travel suitcase. I used it recently and found it to be an excellent case in every respect. I would definitely recommend this to other camera buffs who want a case in which to store their monopods when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: EGD

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my light stand tripod when I go camping. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: H. Choi

customer_reviews.title: Great All-Around Tripod Bag at an Affordable Price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tripod bag, better than what was shown in the illustration. I only have one question for the Slik company: Why on earth was the zipper put on the bottom? Overall, however, it is a very well made and tough product. I have no doubt that I will get many years of satisfying use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: HonestGuy3017

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive bag that really works.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this would be a really cheaply constructed bag for the price, but was pleasantly surprised. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Willover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, good fit
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size and fit for mytripod, and I've been using it ever since receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: kinda of perfect size
customer_reviews.text: kinda of perfect size for 2-soft box and 2- small light stands holding in nice and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: E Mad

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a simple tripod bag. No frills, but I just needed something that will hold up, and allow me throw my tripod over my shoulder, without adding a lot of bulk or weight. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aferg

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a well constructed and sturdy bag. Thick material and the zipper is strong ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well constructed and sturdy bag. Thick material and the zipper is strong and fluid. My Vanguard tripod fits in perfectly with plenty of room for my Manfroto mini tripod in with it. There is also a small zipper pocket in front to put other small accessories, which is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Webberdean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made, excellent quality. Fits my Slik light weight easel perfectly without extra bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Texas

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: To short for my tripod, but fits my tools perfectly. Ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.author: BiggQ

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at the quality for the price. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Warren

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 lights stands, and this bag fits perfectly. Makes me carry them around easier.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great Tripod Bag
customer_reviews.text: Works well and good quality. I like this bag and it works well for my tripod.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great can hold things other than tripods.
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I bought for a retractable fishing rod. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Neil r

customer_reviews.title: It's great! It's a little big for the model of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great! It's a little big for the model of tripod I have but it beats what came with the tripod which was nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lippincott

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price fit my monopod perfectly. Not big enough for a professional grade tripod but it serves its purpose. Strong and durable
customer_reviews.author: Niccol

customer_reviews.title: SLIK Bag may my fit SLIK tripod
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SLIK universal tripod bag specifically for a SLIK tripod and it didn't fit. That was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: W of Florida

customer_reviews.title: Decent carrying case for tripod
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this carrying case for my. It was recommended by Amazon itself. i have used it for 2 outdoor trips in last 3 months. Fabric/Material: Decent quality. Can withstand the wear & tear of occasional use. Zipper is good quality & the carrying strap is good. Use: Convenience to use: Can easily fit in a backpack. Cost: Very cheap. Overall, you get what you pay for. If you are an avid photographer, go to lot of outdoor trips and carry tripod all the time, this is not the right case for you. It might wear out at seams. However, if you are an amateur or do photography as a hobby, this is a decent choice, worth to pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kanishk

customer_reviews.title: Simple quality case
customer_reviews.text: My EWI (Electronic Wind Instrument) is about the same size and shape as a soprano sax. This case does the trick of storing and transporting it easily. There's no padding, which I knew, but I keep a towel wrapped around the EWI and it cushions it safely.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with my tripod has a small pocket for extra quick releases etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good size to store my looflighter grill igniter in.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for storage of my electric looflighter and grill temperature gauge accessories for my Kamado grill. It is a durable bag with enough room for those items.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry a steel trombone stand. It's a little oversize for my needs, but carries the stand (heavier than many tripods) well. The main zipper functions just fine. The 'zippered side pocket' is very small - only about 3 inches square, located beneath the business card-size identification sleeve, so not very spacious or useful. Nevertheless, this case is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case for Small Tripods and Monopods
customer_reviews.text: I've used this regularly for the past six months for a monopod and small tripod. I like slinging it over my shoulder. It is holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Bouffard

customer_reviews.title: Love it.. Works great..
customer_reviews.text: Is able to hold my SLIK Complete Tripod Pro 700DX Amt Tripod with 3-Way Pan and tilt Head Silver (615.315).
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bookheimer

customer_reviews.title: Love it enough to buy another.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this bag would work great for a tripod. I actually bought it to store my BBQ tools (spatula, tongs, etc.) and it is fantastic for this. It's the perfect size for what I wanted. The bag is good quality. I plan to buy a second one, also not for a tripod, but it's just a great bag at the perfect size for a lot of things.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great case, I needed a case for my tripod in FL, when I already had a case in NY for the same tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Stan F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for the Slik 300 Series Tripod!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to go with the Slik 300 Travel Tripod and its a perfect match. Good material, small pocket to store small item(s) you dont want to lose, and a ID card holder. Holds the Slik 300 perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bosch BT150 Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tripod bag for the money! Couldn't be happier. I think all tripods should come with a bag like this one. Bought for my Bosch BT150 compact laser level tripod. Even has a bit of room to spare. It's perfect 👍
customer_reviews.author: David Briot

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive little bag
customer_reviews.text: Good bag except I don't use it for tripod instead for my socket extensions
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good case.....Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Zipper seams ok. I have 2 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ponder

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good bag, good price point. Wish it had a side pocket for a few small things.
customer_reviews.author: jsimodc

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my purpose. Nice durable bag to carry my fishing rod outriggers. Quality and workmanship of item is very good..
customer_reviews.author: Ringo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: My tripod fit perfectly and the quality is great. It doesn't look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Flor A.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Well made, solid, strong zipper. I would have preferred a small pocket or two, which it lacks. But there are few bags this length and SLIK gets a call-out for making this size.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Garner

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I needed a inexpensive case for a tripod that I keep in the car/van for those unexpected photo opps. This case with the strap was perfect for my classic and rare Gitzo Tiltal Jr tripod that I've bought at a yard sale in 1984 for $5.00. It keeps everything in a protected case and safe from spills and bouncing around in the cargo area.
customer_reviews.author: Wookieman

customer_reviews.title: It's an inexpensive tripod bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a bag. It's decent quality. It fits a full sized tripod. I don't have to take out a loan. 👍
customer_reviews.author: H F

customer_reviews.title: It works but only after some re-adjustment
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit of a snug fit for my Slik 504 QF11 and I had to remove the pan head from the body of the tripod to get it inside the bag. It took a wee bit of getting used to but it works.
customer_reviews.author: OliviaClaire

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten this when I first bought the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had gotten this when I first bought the tripod. Really helps in traveling and tramping through the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Welton E. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Could use more padding, but it does exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: Could use more padding, but it does exactly what it's supposed to do. I have all my gear wrapped in a black towel first, then put in the bag (and I need 1 black towel anyway)
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: SLIK Universal Medium Tripod Bag for Tripods up to 23", Black
product_meta.description: Style:PROFESSIONAL| Size:MediumSlik basic Tripod bag, Medium, for tripods up to 23 inches when fully retracted. The Slik TBM Medium Tripod Bag is a weather resistant vinyl bag made to carry a Slik tripod up to 24" long. The bag has an ID window and a zippered pocket on the side. It is carried by an attached shoulder strap.
feature_bullets: Small Zippered ID Pocket with Window
